message.en: Request received a bad response code - check results.statusCode for more details.
The actual data recieved was higher than the data limit.
The content-length header was higher than the data limit - cancelled to not waste time.
While the request succeeded zlib.gunzip has failed. You can see the compressed data in request.data.
While the request succeeded zlib.inflate has failed. You can see the compressed data in request.data.
The protocol provided is invalid. Try 'http:', 'https:', UNIX domain socket, or named pipe instead.
The request was aborted from the client-side before the server responded.
The server aborted the request. The server may be busy or is having trouble with the request parameters.
An error occurred with the request. See details for more information.
The request timed out while attempting to connect to the server.
The request was aborted from the client-side after the server responded.
An error occurred with the response. See details for more information.
The request timed out during the response. The server may be busy or the connection has dropped.
The request timed out after the response, but before any data was recieved. The server may be busy or the connection has dropped.
An error has occurred will reading from the given stream.
Unrecognized content-encoding. The data is included if you want
